summary: The diff does not include the portion of Contact.tsx where the social-media bubbles are defined, so there is no visible evidence that the required href targets, new-tab attributes, or clickable/hover/focus bubble styling were implemented. Additionally, metadata/state files were modified that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the social-media bubble links on the Contact page so that clicking each bubble opens the exact user-provided social profile URL in a new tab (Facebook/YouTube/TikTok/Instagram), keeping target="_blank" and rel="noopener noreferrer".
missing_requirements.reason: The provided Contact.tsx diff is truncated before any social-media bubble/link markup; no evidence shows the specified href values or target/rel attributes were added/updated.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the social-media bubbles are visually and interactively clickable (circular hit area) with clear hover and keyboard focus states, accessible aria-labels, and do not submit the contact form.
missing_requirements.reason: The truncated diff does not show any social icon link elements or their className/aria-label/focus/hover styling, so there is no confirmable implementation evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking update describing the feature as 'pending' in project_state.json.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements only mention implementing Contact page social link behavior and styling; it does not request modifying repository/project state metadata files.
BuildRequest does not request generating or updating file summary documentation; this change is outside stated requirements.
